amendment.description: An amendment to strike section 102 from the bill which allows the Secretary or his designee to engage in activities with States and State legislators to consider proposals related to the reduction of motorcycle fatalities.
amendment.purpose: Amendment strikes section 102 from the bill which allows the Secretary or his designee to engage in activities with States and State legislators to consider proposals related to the reduction of motorcycle fatalities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 189 (Roll no. 299).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 189 (Roll no. 299).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Walberg.
